K10sf241_sc:1: … magadheṣu viharati pūrvavad yāvac chailaguhāyām / ehy enaṁ gatvā paryupāsiṣyāmahe /
K10sf241_sc:2: paramaṁ bhadraṁ te kauśika / iti paṁcaśikho gandharvaputraḥ śakrasya devendrasya
K10sf241_sc:3: pratiśrutya vaiḍūryadaṇḍāṁ vīṇām aṁsenādāya śakrasya devendrasya paricaryām upaga
K10sf241_sc:4: … aśauṣur anye ’pi devās trayastriṁśāḥ / śakro devendraḥ paṁcaśikhaś ca gandharvaputra
K10sf241_sc:5: udyuktau bhagavato ’ntikenopadarśanāya bhagavantaṁ paryupāsanāyai / tatas te py udyuktā
K10sf241_sc:7: atha śakro devendraḥ paṁcaśikhaś ca gandharvaputro … … tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṁmiñjitaṁ
K10sf241_sc:8: vā bāhuṁ prasārayet prasāritaṁ vā saṁmiñjayed evam eva śakro devendraḥ paṁcaśīkhaś
K10sf241_sc:9: ca gandharvaputraḥ … devās trayastriṁśā deveṣu trayastriṁśeṣv antarhitā… vaidekadasya
K10sf241_sc:11: tena khalu samayena vaidehaka … atīvāvabhāsajāta ivāgnyā … khalu vaidehakasya parvatasya / dā … ādahyate bata vaidehakaḥ parvataḥ … parvataḥ / bata hi vaidehaka …
K10sf241_sc:12: … śakro devendraḥ paṁcaśikhaṁ gandharvaputraṁ … rūpāṇi tāni tāta paṁcaśikha sa bhagavān
K10sf241_sc:13: araṇyavanapra … vigatajanapadaka … ḥsevitāni pratisaṁlayanasārūpyāṇi / sacet tarhi
K10sf241_sc:14: mahāśakyamahāśaky … r na sukaram upasaṁkrāntuṁ yathāpi tat pūrvam apratisaṁveditaṁ /
K10sf241_sc:15: sacet tvaṁ tāta paṁcaśikha … bhagavato darśanāyopasaṁkrāntuṁ
K10sf241_sc:16: paramaṁ bhadraṁ tava kauśika / iti paṁcaśikho …
K10sf241_sc:17: … nātyāsanne bhāṣitasya ca śabdaṁ śroṣyate / iti viditvā
K10sf241_sc:44: sa eva me bhadanta tayā bhagi …
K10sf241_sc:47: atha śakrasya devendrasyaitad abhavat / … bhagavāṁ paṁcaśikhena gandharvaputreṇa pratisaṁmodati bhagavāṁ …
K10sf241_sc:51: para maṁ bhadraṁ tava kauśika / iti paṁcaśikho gandharvaputraḥ śakrasya devendrasya
K10sf241_sc:52: pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṁs tenopajāma / upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvaikānte
K10sf241_sc:63: tau prelṣya saṁvegam agāc ca śakro
K10sf241_sc:73: …dhātu … lokaś ca / khalu tasmāt satvā yam eva dhātuṁ saṁjānaṁti tam eva dhātuṁ sthāmaśaḥ parāmṛśyābhiniviśyānuvyavaharanti / idam eva satyaṁ moham anyat /
K10sf241_sc:74: evam etan māriṣa / evam etan māriṣa / na haiva sarvasatvā ekakāmā ekacchandāḥ pūrvavad yāvad
K10sf241_sc:80: kiṁ nu māriṣa sarve te śramaṇabrāmaṇā atyantamoṣṭhā atyantavimalā atyantabrahmacaryaparyavasānāḥ /
K10sf241_sc:81: na haiva kauśika / sarve śramaṇabrāhmaṇā atyantaniṣṭhā atyantavimalā atyantabrahmacaryaparyavasānāḥ /
K10sf241_sc:82: kasmān na kauśika sarve śramaṇabrāhmaṇā atyantaniṣṭhā atyantavimalā atyantabrahmacaryaparyavasānāḥ /
K10sf241_sc:83: api tu ye kecic chramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vātyanta … tṛṣṇāsaṁkṣayavimuktau sa … …
K10sf241_sc:90: abhijānāsitvāṁ kauśika / itaḥ pūrvam evam aparo ’ pi vivekapratilābhaḥ saumanasyapratilābhaḥ saṁjanitum /
K10sf241_sc:92: eko bhūtapūrvaṁ devāsura … devā jayaṁty asurāḥ parājayaṁte ta …
K10sf241_sc:94: … vāyaṁ yad vā divyam ojo yad vāsuram ojastad ubha … samagraṁ … tvā paribhokṣyāmaḥ /
K10sf241_sc:95: sa khalu me saumanasyapratilābho vivekapratilābhaḥ kalahaparyavasāno bhaṇḍanaparyavasāno vigrahaparyavasāno vivādaparyavasānaḥ /
K10sf241_sc:96: ayaṁ me saumanasyapratilābho vivekapratilābho ’kalahaparyavasāno ’bhaṇḍanaparyavasāno ’vigrahaparyavasāno ’vivādaparyavasāno yo me bhagavato ’ntike /
K10sf241_sc:98: tasya mama bhadanta etad abhavad ito ’haṁ cyutvā manuṣyāṇāṁ svabhāvatāyām upapatsyāmi
K10sf241_sc:99: tatra yāni tāni kulāny āḍhyāni mahādhanāni mahābhogāni prabhūtavittopakaraṇāni
K10sf241_sc:101: tadrūpāṇi kulāni svabhāvatāyām upapadya vṛddhim anvayād indriyāṇāṁ paripākāt keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikām pravrajiṣyāmi /
K10sf241_sc:108: … ye te devā rūpino manomayā avikalā ahīnendryāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgapūrṇāḥ śubhavarṇasthāyinaḥ
K10sf241_sc:109: prītbhakṣāḥ prītyahārakāḥ svayaṁprabhā vaihāyasagamā dirghāyuṣo dirgh … upapattir bhaviṣyati /
K10sf241_sc:129: va au … taṁ pra … sa … ulamadhyāgā…r …
K10sf241_sc:138: asmiṁ khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe śakrasya devendrasya virajo vigatamalaṁ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam aśītīnāṁ ca devatāsahasrāṇām /
K10sf241_sc:140: dṛṣṭadharmaḥ prāptadharmo viditadharmaḥ paryavagāḍhadharmas tīrṇakāṁkṣas tīrṇavicikitso ’parapratyayo ’nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ /
K10sf241_sc:141: uttāyāsanād ekāṁsam uttarāsaṁgaṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṁs tenāṁjaliṁ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat /
K10sf241_sc:142: abhikrānto ’haṁ bhadanta abhikrānta eṣo ’haṁ bhagavantaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmi dharmaṁ
K10sf241_sc:143: bhikṣusaṁghaṁ ca / upāsakaṁ ca mān dhārayādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇopetaṁ śaraṇagatam abhiprasannam /
K10sf241_sc:144: atha śakro devendraḥ paṁcaśikhaṁ gandharvaputram āmantrayati / upakaras tvaṁ tāta paṁcaśikhāsmākam upakaraś ca yo hi nāma tvaṁ bhagavantam //
